game_in_progress_client_repair_explanati: Because we detected an error, your League of Legends installation is currently being repaired.
reconnect_notification_reconnect_message: We're attempting to automatically reconnect you to League of Legends. If your Internet connection is otherwise ok, check our support page for possible solutions.
reconnect_notification_reconnect_timeout: We weren't able to reconnect you to League of Legends. Please exit the client and re-open it to try again.
